entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
